projects.title: KanBan Style Task Manager
projects.description: KanBan style task manager built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It allows you to create, edit, and delete tasks, and move them between columns.

projects.title: Bible Reader Web App
projects.description: React app fetching Bible data from external APIs using state management, React Hooks, and React Router.

projects.title: Instagram Uploader
projects.description: JavaScript app that uses Contentful's API to schedule Instagram uploads via CRON. Includes mail parser error handling and runs on Heroku.

projects.title: Roll the Dice App
projects.description: Vanilla JavaScript budget app calculating total income and expenses. Built without libraries, using lexical scoping and closures.
